title: Jonathan Kodjia - Player profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: Jonathan Kodjia is a 36-year old football player aus Cote d'Ivoire, (* Oct 22, 1989 in Saint-Denis, France). Kodjia is Jul 1, 2025 without a club since. He plays in the position Centre-Forward. His market value is €75k.

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: In August 2024, Jonathan Kodjia joined FC Versailles of the Championnat National on a one-year contract with an option for an additional season, marking his return to the French third tier following a stint at Annecy.[48][49] During the 2024–25 season, which concluded on 16 May 2025, Kodjia featured in 13 matches for Versailles, starting 8 and accumulating 658 minutes on the pitch while scoring 2 goals.[50] His contributions, including key finishes in competitive fixtures, supported the team's mid-table finish of 13th place with 36 points from 32 games, securing their mid-table survival ahea
